overview: Two brothers, Abdu and Ronny are on an ambiguous run from the police. While the younger one, Abdu is convinced their missing cult leader -- Shechem is dead, Ronny disregards it. They journey on an off-beat pursuit to find their lost leader, Shechem.
tagline: Two brothers quarrel about the potential death of their missing cult leader, as they pursue a riveting mission to find him.
title: Bandit
